author: USA TODAY, Laurel Demkovich, Special to USA TODAY
title: Born into a pandemic: A new father missed the birth of his twins; now he and his wife can't visit them
description: Coronavirus is forcing hospitals to make hard choices in keeping visitors out. A dad in Atlanta missed his twins' birth and their first days of life
content:
The doctor warned Gerald Fadayomi not to come to the hospital. 
Fadayomi was awaiting test results for the novel coronavirus and had been quarantined in his guest bedroom for two days. His wife, Kiley, was nearly eight months pregnant with twins and at the h… [+5291 chars]
